summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素的值是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.

value.span: 如果值为只读，则为 ；如果它可以修改，则为 。

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建对象之前, 控件应`true`将其设置为`false` , 并将其设置为。A control should have its set to `true` and its set to `false` prior to the creation of a object. ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 一个支持控件模式的值的值以特定于控件的值递增或递减。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103largechange)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103LargeChange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103largechange)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#103)] [!code-csharp[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/CSharp/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIARangeValuePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIARangeValuePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIARangeValuePattern_snippets.vb#101)]

summary.span: 获取将与 属性相加或相减的特定于控件的显著更改值。

span.span: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the property.

value.span: 显著更改值，如果该元素不支持 则为 。

span.span: The large-change value or if the element does not support .
The default value is 0.0.

span.span: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements property.

The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 一个支持控件模式的值的值以特定于控件的值递增或递减。In the following example, an that supports the control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific value. remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 从目标控件获取的对象将传递到检索当前属性值的函数。In the following example, a object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current property values.
